price: Idan kun bayyana wani abu, kõ kuma kuka ɓõye shi, to, lalle Allah Ya kasance Masani ga kõme.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū shayan aw tukh'fūhu fa-inna al-laha kāna bikulli shayin ʿalīman
